title: Nursing Simulation-Based Team Deliberate Practice (Sim-TDP) Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of fundamental nursing skills and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Performing team-based practical exercises in simulation environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can perform core nursing skills with over 90% accuracy in team-based simulation scenarios.
Learners can reduce simulation execution time by 20% based on expert feedback.
Learners can derive at least three improvement points through reflective journaling after simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
